name: RE:End
description:
From the World Seed comes existence, and its irrefutable forces.

The fragments of the World Seed reside in undying Vessels, created by the Mother to guide humanity through this existence.

But the balance has been broken, and the once glorious world of Tarnel is now a land of emptiness and decay.

Anye, the Vessel of Life, wakes a long-forgotten warrior from their rest in the Prison of Death...
